data.title: Dialogic Celebrates New Corporate Headquarters with Ribbon-Cutting Ceremony
data.meta_description: Parsippany, N.J., September 9,2014 - Dialogic Inc., the Network Fuel® company, today celebrated its corporate headquarters relocation in Parsippany with a ribbon-cutting ceremony attended by Parsippany Mayor James Barberio and Dialogic CEO and president Kevin Cook. Located at 4 Gatehall Drive in the award-winning Mack-Cali Business Campus, the LEED-certified building offers modern office spaces, proximity to New York City and a host of amenities that will allow Dialogic to increase operational efficiency and better address customer needs.
data.text:
Tuesday, September 9, 2014

Full-service facility is equipped to better address customer needs

Parsippany, NJ – September 9, 2014 – Dialogic Inc., the Network Fuel® company, today celebrated its corporate headquarters relocation in Parsippany with a ribbon-cutting ceremony attended by Parsippany Mayor James Barberio and Dialogic CEO and president Kevin Cook. Located at 4 Gatehall Drive in the award-winning Mack-Cali Business Campus, the LEED-certified building offers modern office spaces, proximity to New York City and a host of amenities that will allow Dialogic to increase operational efficiency and better address customer needs.

Dialogic’s move comes at a time when demand for its telecommunications software and services is increasing among telecom service providers, developers and enterprise customers. The updated and fully equipped facility will allow Dialogic to leverage its brand and resources globally as it works to meet the evolving demands of a growing customer base, a pillar of the company’s strategic business plan.

“The Gatehall Drive facility gives us the resources and space we need to innovate quickly and stay nimble as industry needs continue to evolve. The move renews our enthusiasm for what this business can accomplish and positions us to better serve customers for years to come,” said Kevin Cook, CEO and president of Dialogic Inc.

“We’re happy Dialogic has chosen to remain in the Parsippany-Troy Hills area and maintain its business ties in the community where it has established a rich 29-year history. Our community’s diverse and thriving economy will continue to benefit from Dialogic’s presence,” said Parsippany Mayor James Barberio.

Addressing those employees in attendance at the ceremony, Cook said, “I want to thank each and every one of you for your efforts in assisting with the planning and transition to this new, full-service facility. It was truly a total team effort.”

About Dialogic

Dialogic, the Network Fuel® company, inspires the world’s leading service providers and application developers to elevate the performance of media-rich communications across the most advanced networks. We boost the reliability of any-to-any network connections, supercharge the impact of applications and amplify the capacity of congested networks. Forty-eight of the world’s top 50 mobile operators and nearly 3,000 application developers rely on Dialogic to redefine the possible and exceed user expectations. Follow us on Twitter @Dialogic.

For more information on Dialogic and communications solutions energized by our technology, visit www.dialogic.com and www.dialogic.com/showcase. Also, visit our social media newsroom for the latest news, videos and blog posts.
